subject: CABLE PROBLEME GT2
description_text: Hello, I am a customer of yours and have a GT2 hub and Pro X pedals. I am very satisfied with my equipment, and I plan to get an H and sequential gearbox soon. However, I have a problem with the cable that connects my steering wheel to the PC. I can therefore no longer use my equipment. I would like you to inform me about the cable and give me a reference so that I can order quickly. I would like to point out that this request has already been made to you via WhatsApp, and I have not received a response. So please help me. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominique CASTEL,   What issue are you experiencing with the GT2 steering wheel cable? Please provide a photo, and we can arrange to send you a new one free of charge.
I think the wires in the cable are becoming unsoldered. As a result, they are no longer transmitting information. envoyé : 5 août 2025 à 14:32 de : "service@simsonn.com"
